ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of DONALD SAVOIE, O.C., O.N.B., of Moncton, New Brunswick, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
